entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 March 2023
